Package com.flowpowered.react.constraint

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BallAndSocketJoint
    This class represents a ball-and-socket joint that allows arbitrary rotation between two bodies.
    BallAndSocketJoint.BallAndSocketJointInfo
    This structure is used to gather the information needed to create a ball-and-socket joint.
    ConstraintSolver
    This class represents the constraint solver that is used to solve constraints between the rigid bodies.
    ConstraintSolver.ConstraintSolverData
    This structure contains data from the constraint solver that is used to solve each joint constraint.
    ContactPoint
    Represents a collision contact point between two bodies in the physics engine.
    ContactPoint.ContactPointInfo
    This structure contains information about a collision contact computed during the narrow-phase collision detection.
    FixedJoint
    This class represents a fixed joint that is used to forbid any translation or rotation between two bodies.
    FixedJoint.FixedJointInfo
    This structure is used to gather the information needed to create a fixed joint.
    HingeJoint
    This class represents a hinge joint that allows arbitrary rotation between two bodies around a single axis.
    HingeJoint.HingeJointInfo
    This structure is used to gather the information needed to create a hinge joint.
    Joint
    This abstract class represents a joint between two bodies.
    Joint.JointInfo
    This structure is used to gather the information needed to create a joint.
    Joint.JointListElement
    This structure represents a single element of a linked list of joints.
    SliderJoint
    This class represents a slider joint.
    SliderJoint.SliderJointInfo
    This structure is used to gather the information needed to create a slider joint.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Joint.JointType
    An enumeration of the possible joint types (contact).
